CommandArguments.Arguments: timedatectl set-timezone UTC ; timedatectl | grep zone | tr -d ' '

targetCondition: from devices.modules where moduleId='osconfig' AND tags.country = 'NONE'

queries.compliantCount: select deviceId, properties.desired.Settings.DeviceHealthTelemetryConfiguration from devices.modules where configurations.[[config-sensitive]].status = 'Applied' AND properties.reported.Settings.DeviceHealthTelemetryConfiguration.value = 0
queries.detailedStatus: select deviceId AS --DEVICE--, connectionState as -CONNECTED-, tags.country AS -COUNTRY-, properties.desired.Settings.DeviceHealthTelemetryConfiguration AS TelLevel_Desired, properties.reported.Settings.DeviceHealthTelemetryConfiguration.value AS TelLevel_Reported, properties.desired.CommandRunner.CommandArguments.Arguments AS Cmd_Desired, properties.reported.CommandRunner.CommandStatus.TextResult as Cmd_OutputReported from devices.modules where configurations.[[config-sensitive]].status = 'Applied'
